entry.title: CCSCodeStandard
entry.summary:
A custom Roslyn analyzer designed to help developers enforce consistent naming conventions in VB.NET projects.
Currently supports: - Enforcing type-based variable name prefixes (e.g., str for String, int for Integer, gc for public constants) - Automatic code fixes to rename variables to the correct prefix - Detection of missing 'As' clauses in variable declarations - Code actions to add missing type annotations automatically - Special handling for fields including public/private distinction and constants - Support for variable declarations, parameters, and ForEach loop control variables
This tool improves code readability, maintainability, and consistency across your teamâ€™s codebase. More features and rules are planned for future updates to further enhance code quality and developer productivity.
